column1: The Purple Pig////Oh my gosh sums it up pretty well. I traveled for work for years
column2: so I've become a bit of a food snob over time. This place is amazing
column3: and definitely one of the best meals I've ever had in Chicago. It is SO busy though
column4: so come during an off time. We showed up around 4:00 p.m. on a Saturday and our wait was less than 5 minutes. By 5:00
column5: the wait was somewhere between 30 - 60 minutes. If you're waiting
column6: it's a bit awkward hanging out outside (weather permitting) or in the back hallway
column7: but the food is so worth it.
